body_html:
I encounter the same warning with tf version 1.6.0 on ArchLinux

WARNING:tensorflow:From /usr/lib/python3.6/site-packages/tensorflow/python/util/deprecation.py:497: calling conv1d (from tensorflow.python.ops.nn_ops) with data_format=NHWC is deprecated and will be removed in a future version.
Instructions for updating:
`NHWC` for data_format is deprecated, use `NWC` instead

WARNING:tensorflow:From /usr/lib/python3.6/site-packages/tensorflow/python/util/deprecation.py:497: calling conv1d (from tensorflow.python.ops.nn_ops) with data_format=NHWC is deprecated and will be removed in a future version.
Instructions for updating:
`NHWC` for data_format is deprecated, use `NWC` instead
body:
I encounter the same warning with tf  version `1.6.0` on ArchLinux
```
WARNING:tensorflow:From /usr/lib/python3.6/site-packages/tensorflow/python/util/deprecation.py:497: calling conv1d (from tensorflow.python.ops.nn_ops) with data_format=NHWC is deprecated and will be removed in a future version.
Instructions for updating:
`NHWC` for data_format is deprecated, use `NWC` instead
```
